Plot: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his two human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.
Title: The Muppets
Writer: Jason Segel, Nicholas Stoller, Jim Henson (based on)
Actors: Jason Segel, Amy Adams, Chris Cooper, Rashida Jones
tomatoConsensus: Clever, charming, and heartfelt, The Muppets is a welcome big screen return for Jim Henson's lovable creations that will both win new fans and delight longtime devotees.
